channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023071007
item.description:
Report X-2023071007

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-12
  • City: QUINCY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package loaded in P&D vehicle incorrectly on shelf with other packages on top, causing the box to crush and one bottle to leak DescribePack: Bottle crushed and leaked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Removed other boxes from on top of packages. Cleaned spill with neutralizer

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package handler noticed wet box. put in spill bucket and brought to QA damage area DescribePack: two of the plastic gallon jugs leaked from loose caps DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package placed in spill bucket. spill contained immediately.

item.title: Report X-2023070732
item.description:
Report X-2023070732

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler discovered hazmat package was leaking. Package was handled with rubber gloves, placed in hazardous bin, and taken to fume hood in hazmat cage. Absorbent pads were used to clean up the spill. DescribePack: Lid to the can of toner was loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in hazard bin quickly and transported to fume hood. Spill was cleaned with absorbent pads immediately.

item.title: Report X-2023061435
item.description:
Report X-2023061435

  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE LOAD, RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED BY RESPONDER AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR OXIDIZERS. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR OXIDIZERS
